input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Encouragement level has a direct effect on studying habit and exam score. Studying habit has a direct effect on exam score. For students who are not encouraged, the probability of high exam score is 38%. For students who are encouraged, the probability of high exam score is 80%. Will encouragement decrease the chance of high exam score?
